__comment: The beginning of Journey to The Far Lands! I'm going to start naming this 'jevent_1' instead of 'event_18' because that was getting confusing. September 4th, 2021.

description.text: Journey to The Far Lands II - September 4th, 2021
After traversing The Gray Valley, the northern end of Severed Reach stands in your way. The ancient Delvers had a secret passageway to quickly pass through the mountain range, or so the stories say.
